attributes.name: meanSpeed
attributes.description: Mean wind speed (along wind propagation direction)

attributes.name: longitudinalFileName
attributes.description: Path and filename for the fluctuating longitudinal wind time series

attributes.name: lateralFileName
attributes.description: Path and filename for the fluctuating lateral wind time series

attributes.name: verticalFileName
attributes.description: Path and filename for the fluctuating vertical wind time series

attributes.name: lowerLeftX
attributes.description: X-coordinate of the upwind lower left data point, in wind aligned coordinates

attributes.name: lowerLeftY
attributes.description: Y-coordinate of the upwind lower left data point, in wind aligned coordinates

attributes.name: lowerLeftZ
attributes.description: Z-coordinate of the upwind lower left data point, in wind aligned coordinates

attributes.name: numPointsX
attributes.description: Number of grid points in X- (longitudinal) direction

attributes.name: numPointsY
attributes.description: Number of grid points in Y- (lateral) direction

attributes.name: numPointsZ
attributes.description: Number of grid points in Z- (vertical) direction

attributes.name: numSlices
attributes.description: Buffer size: Number of wind crossectional planes (Slices) in memory

attributes.name: reverseBox
attributes.description: Read turbulence box in reverse direction
